job_history.work_description: GST implementation project in RHB Group in Malaysia

job_history.role_name: Client Solution Architect, IBM Software Group, ASEAN
job_history.work_description: Focus on driving new solution/workload in key account for sales closure by working with clients to understand their business requirements and propose IT solutions to address them as well as oversee the delivery of the proposed solution.
Provided technical leadership on Core Banking business processes and requirement for success of the development, maintenance and implementation of ICBA for banking customers.
Responsible for developing and application design of new projects and maintenance of Core Banking system running on the mainframe system.
